Posts.EditableText:
So here I am to present the demo of my first Quest game, Omega.
Heavily inspired by the story of System Shock, as well as the Alien franchise, Omega is a sci-fi horror adventure that aims to create a cold and dreary atmosphere, in which every decision can be fatal, and danger lurks behind every corner.
Currently, this project is already taking too much of my free time, and it is written solely in Spanish. If anyone would like to translate it into English (or any other language, for that matter), be welcome to get in touch with me. Not only for the glory of appearing in the final game's credits, but for the joy of bringing a new story to as many people as possible. Bear in mind that I'm broke and payment would be... well, impossible.
Any opinions, feedback or critique is also welcome, of course. I'm still fairly new to Quest and I still have quite a lot of room for improvement.
And, without further ado, here's the link to the demo. Thanks for your time, for playing (if you do play), and for any help that may come my way:
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/n4dh4u8ehucykz-mfslrsa/omega
